item.title: nCine Dev Update 21
item.description:
In this article, weâ€™ll go over the progress of the nCine throughout 2024.

OpenAL EFX

The biggest change this year has been support for the OpenAL EFX extension. You can now apply effects to any audio player, like reverb, echo, flanger, and more, and use low and high-pass filters.

item.title: nCine Dev Update 11
item.description:
Exciting news for this development update: a new supported platform! 🍾

Emscripten

I remember playing with the idea of porting the nCine to Emscripten years ago. After all I had every requirement in place: I used OpenGL ES for Android, GLFW and SDL2 as input backends, OpenAL and Vorbis for audio, libpng for images and already supported a POSIX API.
